translation.offerLocalized: Your browser prefers «{{lngName}}», but you use «{{lngName2}}» version. Would you like to switch to «{{lngName}}»?

home.heroSubhead: Master a language faster by chatting with AI. Transform your language learning experience with personalized neural network chat-based tools.
explain: Speaks with you as a real teacher and aims to improve your talking skills and pronunciation.
Motivates you on your journey as you take charge with intensive learning for personalized progress
Adapts to your learning, swiftly using new words based on your interests and knowledge level.
Explains everything clearly on each step, ensuring new knowledge is only a click away.

sources.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{sourceName}}?
sources.unsubscribeConfirm: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from {{sourceName}}?

article.disclaimer: All content and tasks are generated by AI inspired by a real publication.

p:
We have a category of content generated for free for everyone with default settings (B1 language level, no custom vocabulary, news image style, standard voices).
        You are welcome to use it for free forever, but if you want to customize it, you will need to create a free or paid account, depending on the level of customization you need.
The free content is generated automatically every day, so it is always up to date.

inquiry.subHeader: Leave us some contact details and we will get back to you
inquiry.subHeader2: We will get back to you within one business day.
inquiry.plhMessage: Anything else we need to know?

login.hint:
Select your authentication method.
Creating an account is free and quick!
login.disclaimer: By proceeding, you agree to our terms and privacy policy.
login.receiveOffers: receive special offers from our partners

onboarding.s2Header: Right now we support a limited amount of languages that our teammates and testers can verify and test. We will add more!
onboarding.s4Header: Let's test your mic and headphones
onboarding.msgPlayback: If you have not heard the sound, please check your headphones and microphone and try again.
onboarding.msgMicError: You may have problems with your microphone

feed.emptyText: Follow some sources to get started.
feed.emptyText2: If you have just subscribed to a source new articles will appear here within 24h.
intro: We start from the main navigation bar. Here's the feed. All new articles will appear there.
Here's a dictionary. It tracks your memory progress and helps you to refresh the words you've already learned.
Here you talk to an AI teacher. At the end of each article there's a button to discuss it with the teacher.
Sources define what articles you see in the feed.
This is your account configuration: change language settings, export your data, and so on.
So, here is your future feed, but it's empty now. Let's finish this intro and go add some sources!
So, here is your future feed. You already have something here. Let's finish this intro and go reading!

account.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
account.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account.deleteConfirmation: Your account will be deleted in 30 days.

vocabulary.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this word?
vocabulary.emptyPlaceholderHint: Talk to AI-teacher or add words in articles to fill it.

talk.confirmDrop: We found a previous unrelated discussion. Shall we drop it?
talk.phInputMobile: Type here or touch and hold to speak...
talk.phInputDesktop: Type here or hold 'space' on your keyboard and speak...
talk.pttHint: No-no, you need to hold 'space' on your real keyboard, where you type with fingers. 😉
talk.lngMismatch: Warning: your chat language is '{{CHAT_LNG}}' while you are learning '{{TARGET_LNG}}'. Restart the chat to align them.

userCard.streakInfo: Your streak is the number of consecutive days you've been learning with Lingolette. Keep it up!
userCard.gemsInfo: Gems are a virtual currency you can use to buy premium features and content. You earn gems by learning and completing tasks.
userCard.energyInfo: Energy is used to talk to AI teacher, read articles, and to do other activities.

feedback.placeholder: What would you like to improve or fix?
feedback.thankYou: Thank you! Your message will help us make the product better.

audioPermissions.inRequired: Voice chat requires microphone permission. Please grant it.
audioPermissions.outRequired: Voice chat requires playback permission. Press OK to grant it.

offerPWA.text: Would you like to add Lingolette web app to your home screen for quick access?

chatResults.mainText: Today you got a bit closer to your goal. You can either go back to the chat or restart the session and start anew.

addWords.header: Add any words you want to learn
addWords.toastAddFailed: Failed to add word '{{word}}'. Does it even exist?

info: Oops, our linguistic explorers are on a thrilling quest for articles in a language yet to be unveiled. It seems they're still packing their dictionaries and setting up grammar traps!

Fear not, dear polyglot-in-waiting! While we're decoding the secrets of this intriguing tongue, why not flex those linguistic muscles with our existing languages? Dust off your French, stretch your Spanish, and polish your Klingon (just kidding, we don't have Klingon... yet).
noArticles.ctaHint: Because who needs articles when you can conquer the world with words!

contextTools.logInForContext: Log in to get translations, context tools, pronunciation and more.

articleView.logInForAssessment: Log in to get your answers assessed by AI.
articleView.readingSubhead: Read this text and listen to it at the same time. If you don't know a word click it to see explanation.
articleView.questionsSubhead: Answer the questions to the text. Speak or write, you choose. AI will assess your answers.
articleView.discussSubhead: Discuss the text the AI teacher. The teacher will help you with vocabulary and grammar.
articleView.discussP: The artificial intelligence teacher has a lot of benefits. You don't need to book any time slot. You don't have to wait for the teacher to come to class. You can learn at any time. The teacher will never get bored and can keep a conversation on any related topic.
articleView.logInForDiscussion: Log in to start the conversation with AI.

speakTextInput.hint: Type or hold mic icon to speak
